sentence.Network_en: Thus , we should keep on promoting the monetization reform of wage system.

sentence.Network_en: Economists have another term to describe the monetization of government debt.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济学家有另一个术语来描述政府债券的货币化:“铸币税”.
